favourite.article: Oh How sweet that Jesus wants His sweetheart!! The Church!
Amen our Beloved LORD, we want You, we want Your smiling eyes.. Possess & Seal us to You, how long O our LORD & our God..

Hi, Totally unexpected, God The Father asked someone to marry Him, in 2007, late in 2007. She said yes, but not instantly. He reassured her twice she was up to it. On the third day, she trusted Him, and said yes. It is complicated.
Praise the Lord:).... Amen A Match You:) Gain Lord, Gain HER :) !!!!
Lord, I want to love You! I want to be Your bride. I want to be Your match, Your counterpart. I want to be Your sweetheart, to know You! Thank you for loving us. I love You, Lord!
Beautiful song. Amen.
Amen!

I enjoyed the video training in the Minor Prophets. Hosea reveals that we are all like "Gomer"- a prostitute having a dreadful background who was far from spotless. We have found many lovers and utterly forsook our husband.
However God's heart was not touched from this betrayal. We should not think of ourselves as a dutiful, submissive, utterly faithful ones. We need to realize THERE IS A PARTICULAR LOVE IN GOD TOWARDS US, HIS PERSPECTIVE SPOUSE THAT ENABLES HIM TO PERSIST AND EVENTUALLY TO CONQUER EVERY NEGATIVE THING. HOW AMAZING!
I just want to LOVE YOU LORD JESUS. I LOVE TO HEAR IT. PRAISE THE LORD.
Someone to love HIm, not just to fear Him. Someone to match Him, not just to imitate Him. Oh, Lord, there are no words for You except Truth!
God's love truly constrains us! For us to love Him more, we must know Him more! May God cause us to see more of Himself...
Amen! Lord I give You my deepest gratitude for desiring our love!
Marvellous!
The highest desire of God is to have a counterpart, a bride for His Son. This the pupil of God's eye. How few of the Lord's people know God's heart.
Oh how we, the church, need to realise the truth in this song. GOD WANTS SOMEONE TO LOVE HIM!

My math teacher kept using these kinds of songs for devotion time. At first, I thought this kind of hymns sounds so ancient but when I look up the website and heard this piano, it just sounds so GOOD! And so, I am going to play this song in chapel for our song:)
The Lord wants someone to love Him, not serve Him or fear Him. WE MUST LOVE THE LORD!
Amen the Lord loves us, I am just a 11 year old, but when I heard this song, it touched me.
I want to shout this thing to the whole inhabited earth that I LOVE YOU LORD JESUS. I just love Him and that is because of His economy.
Lord, grant us a heart that loves You more!
OH LORD, I JUST LOVE YOU.
Saints, the Lord wants someone to love Him! Praise Him, this someone is us! i really liked seeing the side from the Lord's perspective
From this song I realized in everything He did for us was because He loved and cared for us. Now all He wants is us to love Him.
This song realy touched me because it has a meaning of knowing God and that He wants someone to love Him. Amen.
